DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study Evaluate Safety DILATREND SR Cap . Korean Patients Essential hypertension , Chronic stable angina Congestive heart failure 52 week .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Evaluate Safety DILATREND SR Cap . Korean Patients With Essential Hypertension , Chronic Stable Angina Congestive Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 19 year old Patients Essential hypertension , Chronic stable angina Congestive heart failure 2 . Possible take Dilatrend SR label 3. take Caverdilol 6 month Agreement date 4 . Agreement write informed consent 1 . Pregnancy lactation 2 . Known hypersensitivity Carvedilol 3 . Cardiogenic shock 4 . Abnormality conduction system Severe bradycardia ( In particular , pulse < 50beats / min ) , 2nd degree AV block , Complete AV block , Sinus Block , Sick Sinus Syndrome 5 . Cor pulmonale 6 . IDDM ketoacidosis , metabolic acidosis 7. severe heart disease ( Heart failure NYHA functional class 4 ) 8 . Respiratory disease Asthma , Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease 9 . Secondary hypertension 10 . Prinzmetal 's angina 11 . Acute pulmonary embolism 12 . Pheochromocytoma 13 . Take MAO lnhibitor ( except MAOB ) 14 . Hypotension ( SBP 90mmHg less ) 15 . Severe hepatic dysfunction 16 . Peripheral circulatory disturbance ( ex . Raynaud syndrome , intermittent claudication ) 17 . Has edema glottitis 18 . Has heart attack complication 19 . Fluid retention overload require intravenous inotropes 20 . Allergic rhinitis
